definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Reading informational texts for pleasure or to learn new information.
sentences.chinese: 以獲得樂趣或獲取信息爲目地閱讀說明文。

sentences.english: Information is captured in text and produced in document form.
sentences.chinese: 以文字形式獲取信息並編製成文檔形式。

sentences.english: Select a dimension to get info and highlight its references.
sentences.chinese: 選擇一尺寸以獲取信息並加亮其參照。

sentences.english: Compliments heard second-hand have more credibility within the intended recipient.
sentences.chinese: 二手讚美比刻意在人前奉承更能取信於人。

sentences.english: Thus I say that when a command is promulgated, an order issued, its credibility will extend throughout the state.
sentences.chinese: 所以說，號令一經發出，就必須取信於民而風行全國。

sentences.english: Yes, I will get the mail.
Access to information Maytag troubleshooting machine and video.
sentences.chinese: 獲取信息對美泰克機故障排除和視頻。

sentences.english: It captures information over time and uses these figure to generate helpful and informative charts.
sentences.chinese: 它實時獲取信息，並用這些數據來創造有用的圖表。

sentences.english: To basically master the method of scanning.
sentences.chinese: 基本掌握利用跳讀技巧獲取信息的能力。

sentences.english: How can you get the info without meetings?
sentences.chinese: 如何才能又不開會又能獲取信息？

sentences.english: We must win the people's confidence with tangible achievements in the building of the Party's style and of a clean government.
sentences.chinese: 我們一定要以黨風廉政建設的實際成果取信於人民。

sentences.english: Tune to your local radio or television station for information.
sentences.chinese: 調到你當地的電視臺和收音機頻道獲取信息。

sentences.english: This represents a much smarter methodology of how consumers obtain information.
sentences.chinese: 它表示消費者獲取信息方式更加智能化的方法。

sentences.english: So, when you take a test, you don't accept information from others.
sentences.chinese: 你們考試的時候，你不能從他人那獲取信息。

sentences.english: First, credit management in order to lower prices and better quality services, to win the trust.
sentences.chinese: 誠信經營以質優價廉的服務，取信於民。

sentences.english: In fact, retrieving information is simple even for non-text data.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，對於非文本數據，獲取信息也很簡單。

definition: to act as surety for sb/to be sb's guarantor/to stand bail for sb
mere verbal statement cannot be taken as proof (idiom)
to speak and keep one's promise (idiom); as good as one's word
to harbor evil intentions (idiom); concealing malice
